details: For every Fairywork crafted, characters have a 25% chance of creating a second one, as well as a 10% change of keeping their ingredients. The amount of Explosive Capsules dropped by Bwork Magi is also doubled.
Experienced gained in the Temple of the Great Ougaa is increased by 125%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Tree Keeholo monsters are increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 250% against Onis.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Grassy Plains area.
The quantity of Bombu, Oliviolet and Maple harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 125%.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in the Frigost Village and Icefields areas.
A special repeatable quest is available today near Amakna Castle. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
The resource protectors are 5 times more likely to appear during harvesting activities than usual.
All varieties of Turquoise Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
Experience gained in the Scaraleaf Plain area is increased by 100%.
The quantity of Malt harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Skeunk's Hideout dungeon.
The quality of items crafted in the city of Astrub is increased.
Gobbowl Surprises have been added to monster loot. When you use them, you'll receive Gobbagums of various flavours.
Plants harvested by alchemists will reappear 100% more quickly than usual.
The chances of obtaining loot from Mopy Kings are increased by 150%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Plantala area.
The quantity of Tin and Silicate harvested by miners is increased by 150%.
A special repeatable quest is available today to the east of the Lumberjacks' Workshop in Amakna Forest. It is available to players of level 20 or higher and is not attached to the offering quest.
Tailors have a 10% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Snowfoux Caverns area.
The quantity of Perch, Monkfish, Lard Bass, and Tench harvested by fishermen is increased by 150%.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Field Dungeon are increased by 125%.
Experience gained in the Tree Keeholo Foliage area is increased by 100%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Tainela area.
For each item crafted, Farmers have a 25% chance of creating a second one.
The quantity of Blood-Soaked Meat harvested by hunters is increased by 125%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Kaliptus Forest area.
Experience gains are increased by 75% with Dreggons and Dragosses.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Petrified Forest area are increased by 100%.
